articles.description: TikTok user @annaxjames started the trend with her own clip about her experience working at Hollister, which is owned by Abercrombie & Fitch Co.
articles.content:
Former employees of large corporations are spilling the 'secrets' that they learned on the job in a series of eye-opening videos that expose the culture and policies at major companies. 
TikTok user… [+6665 chars]
